tool_description: Calculates target portfolio allocations based on investment strategy, market conditions, and constraints.

strategy_type.description: Investment strategy: strategic, tactical, risk_parity, equal_weight, momentum, mean_reversion

asset_symbols.description: Array of asset symbols to allocate

risk_tolerance.description: Risk tolerance level: conservative, moderate, aggressive

allocation_constraints.description: Array of allocation constraints as percentages

error_messages: Invalid strategy type: Must be one of [strategic, tactical, risk_parity, equal_weight, momentum, mean_reversion].
Invalid risk tolerance: Must be one of [conservative, moderate, aggressive].
Asset data unavailable: Cannot retrieve data for one or more asset symbols.
Constraint violation: Allocation constraints sum exceeds 100% or contain negative values.
Insufficient data: Not enough historical data for the specified lookback period.
usage: Specify strategy_type, asset_symbols, and risk_tolerance. Optionally provide benchmark_symbol, allocation_constraints, and lookback_days for customized targeting.

target_weights.description: Target allocation weights for each asset
